function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Misunderstanding of culture and context leading to inappropriate information or abuse","Impact":"Inappropriate design decisions, cultural insensitivity, or disrespectful use of indigenous materials","Mitigation":"Cultural awareness training, collaboration with local experts, thorough research on cultural context","Technologies":"Cultural sensitivity training programs, virtual reality simulations of local contexts","People":"Local communities, indigenous groups, cultural heritage stakeholders","Owner":"Designers, architects, project managers"},{"Description":"A sense of loss evoked when designs change negatively or are demolished","Impact":"Emotional distress, loss of attachment to familiar places, community disconnection","Mitigation":"Involving community in design decisions, preserving culturally significant landmarks, creating alternative community spaces","Technologies":"Community engagement platforms, digital preservation tools for cultural landmarks","People":"Local residents, community members, preservation organizations","Owner":"Urban planners, developers, preservation advocates"}]}
